But <WG3588> <WG5347> Festus, <WG1161> With The <WG3588> Jews <WG2453> Wishing <WG2309> Favour <WG5485> To Acquire For Himself <WG2698> Answering <WG611> <WG3588> Paul <WG3972> Said, <WG2036> Art Thou Willing <WG2309> To <WG1519> Jerusalem <WG2414> Having Gone Up <WG305> There <WG1563> Concerning <WG4012> These Things <WG5130> To Be Judged <WG2919> ' Before <WG1909> Me? <WG1700>

If <WG1487> Indeed <WG3303> For <WG1063> I Do Wrong <WG91> And <WG2532> Worthy <WG514> Of Death <WG2288> Have Done <WG4238> Anything, <WG5100> I 3756 PRT-N Do Not Deprecate 3868 V-PNI-1S 3588 T-ASN To Die; 599 V-2AAN If 1487 COND But 1161 CONJ Nothing 3762 A-NSN There Is 2076 V-PXI-3S Of Which 3739 R-GPN They 3778 D-NPM Accuse 2723 V-PAI-3P Me, 3450 P-1GS No One 3762 A-NSM Me 3165 P-1AS Can 1410 V-PNI-3S To Them 846 P-DPM Give Up. 5483 V-ADN To Caesar 2541 N-ASM I Appeal. 1941 V-PMI-1S

Then <WG5119> <WG3588> Festus, <WG5347> Having Conferred <WG4814> With <WG3326> The <WG3588> Council, <WG4824> Answered, <WG611> To Caesar <WG2541> Thou Hast Appealed, <WG1941> To <WG1909> Caesar <WG2541> Thou Shalt Go. <WG4198>

<WG2250> And Days <WG1161> Having Passed <WG1230> Certain, <WG5100> Agrippa <WG67> The <WG3588> King <WG935> And <WG2532> Bernice <WG959> Came Down <WG2658> To <WG1519> Caesarea, <WG2542> Saluting <WG782> <WG3588> Festus. <WG5347>

To <WG4314> Whom <WG3739> <WG611> I Answered, <WG3754> It <WG3756> Is Not <WG2076> A Custom <WG1485> With Romans <WG4514> To Give Up <WG5483> Any <WG5100> Man <WG444> To <WG1519>, Destruction, <WG684> <WG4250> Before <WG2228> He <WG3588> <WG2723> Being Accused <WG2596> Face To Face <WG4383> May Have <WG2192> The <WG3588> Accusers, <WG2725> <WG5117> And Opportunity <WG5037> Of Defence <WG627> He May Get <WG2983> Concerning <WG4012> The <WG3588> Accusation. <WG1462>

Having Come Together <WG4905> Therefore <WG3767> They <WG846> Here, <WG1759> Delay <WG311> None <WG3367> Having Made, <WG4160> The <WG3588> Next Day <WG1836> Having Sat <WG2523> On <WG1909> The <WG3588> Judgment Seat <WG968> I Commanded <WG2753> To Be Brought <WG71> The <WG3588> Man; <WG435>
